actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Crude Oil Windfall Profit Tax Act of 1980 with respect to the effective date for changes in the investment credit relating to coke ovens.

summary.text: Amends the Crude Oil Windfall Profit Tax Act of 1980 to move up the effective date of its provisions making coke ovens eligible for the energy investment tax credit from December 31, 1979, to September 30, 1978.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Crude Oil Windfall Profit Tax Act of 1980 with respect to the effective date for changes in the investment credit relating to coke ovens.
